long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,:
Let Denote - Save TikTok & FB Ad be your most powerful and invaluable tool for businesses. We can save ads from TikTok Creative Center, organize them into your Denote boards then share  and comment them with your team. 
Save Tiktok creative video ads with one click, quickly gather interesting video material and re-creation. We built Denote - Save TikTok & FB Ad to build a collection of inspiring videos for your next ad campaign. 
Features:
â— More effective : Tag your Ads and offer comment & share function with your re-creation.
â— Easy to use: Save TikTok ads from creative center with one click.
â— No watermark: The video you saved without watermark.
â— No Expired Links: Save ads get stored in the cloud and you have access forever.
How to use:
â€’ Pin Denote - Save TikTok & FB Ad to the toolbar.
â€’ Click the extension icon in toolbar and go to TikTok Creative Center.
â€’ Click see analysis button over the TikTok video and into video analysis Page.
â€’ Click save button under the ads video and it will save to your denote boards.
ğŸš€ Denote - Save TikTok & FB Ad is the #1 way to save ads from TikTok Creative Center to your denote boards and FB Ad Library is on the way. It is a completely effective material gathering tool, it is light weight and simple enough, Use it now to help content creator double the ROI.
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US:
Save creative ads from FB & TikTok & Instagram with one click.

Denote is an efficient and convenient Chrome extension designed to simplify your advertising workflow. It allows you to easily save ads from overseas social media platforms, such as FB, TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest, Google Transparency, and other social media sites, storing them permanently on your board. Additionally, it supports creating a team material library for seamless collaboration and sharing with team members, all aimed at streamlining and enhancing your advertising process.

ğŸŒŸNewest Features Update in July 2024!
â— Brand Tracking: Automatically track competitor creatives and promptly obtain high-quality creatives from the competitor's creative library.
â— Denote AI: Use Denote AI creative assistant to analyze competitor ads, get Ad copy, gain unique creative insights.

ğŸ’¡ Key features:
â— Ads that never expire.
â— Save ad inspirations to boards and folders.
â— 4 million+ ad material library.
â— Rich Ad Finder tools to help you better discover creatives
â— 800K+ new ad materials added daily.
â— Effortless team collaboration and permission management.
â— Powerful AI filters.
â— Batch download watermark-free ads (images, MP4, etc.).
â— One-click export creative posters.
â— Batch export ad data.
â— Detailed ad data insights (image/video, brand name, ad copy, CTA type, ad likes, original link, landing page URL, etc.).
â— Share board links with others.
â— Simple ad tag management.
â— Support embedding into Notion.

ğŸš€ How to Utilize Denote - Save TikTok & FB Ad:

1.Add to Web Browser: Add and pin the extension to your browser toolbar for quick access.
2.Go to Ad Library: Click the AdsLibrary icon, select the ad platforms, and then search for ads.
3.One-click Save: On the search results page, each ad has a save button that you can click to save the ad.
4.Check Saved Ads: Click the AdsLibrary icon on the toolbar, then click "View Your Saved Ads" to view the ads you have saved.

Denote's efficient workflow simplifies ad curation and management across platforms, delivering a seamless ad-saving experience.

We believe Denote benefits marketers and those seeking ad insights. Your feedback is invaluable to improving the extension and Denote overall. Your suggestions will help refine our offerings and enhance the user experience.

For more information, visit https://denote.net/.

long.pt_BR,pt_PT:
Save ads from TikTok, FB Ad Library, Instagram. Best marketing tool for finding ad ideas.
Let Denote - Save TikTok & FB & Instagram Ad be your most powerful and invaluable tool for businesses. 

ğŸš€ Features
â— Ad library: Save ads from multiple platforms at the click of a button! 
â— No watermark: The video you saved without watermark.
â— Smooth management: Store the totality of ad asset in a single location. Stay organized with folders & boards, tags and automated industry filters.
â— Seamless Collaboration: Share board/creative with anyone. Manage creatives with team members, and discuss to spark ideas.

ğŸš€ You can save ads directly from multiple platforms:
â— FB Ads Library
â— TikTok Creative Center
â— FB
â— TikTok
â— TikTok Ad Libraryï¼ˆTikTok's Commercial Content Libraryï¼‰
â— Instagram
â— Pinterest
â— LinkedIn
â— YouTube

ğŸš€ When you save ads, it also include all the associated metadata from the platform, allowing you to see the data:
â— Image/Video
â— Text (Authors, Title, Description)
â— Platform
â— Objective/CTA Type
â— Engagementï¼ˆlikes, comments, shareï¼‰
â— Category
â— Original Link
â— Landing Page URL and Screenshot
â— AD Summary
â— Targeting Summaryï¼ˆGender & Ageï¼‰
â— Ad information (Advertiser, Ad paid for by, Registered location)
â— Suggest Keyword of TikTokï¼ˆComing Soonï¼‰

ğŸš€ Perfect for
â— E-commerce and Advertising Agencies
â— Media Companies or Video Creators
â— Creative Departments in Corporations

ğŸš€ How to Use
â— Pin Denote - Save TikTok & FB Ad to the toolbar.
â— Click the extension icon in toolbar, then you can easily access TikTok, FB Ads Library, and other platforms.
â— Get a dropdown & a save button. The dropdown allows you to select what board you would like to save the ad to.
â— Go to Denote to view all your saved ads. Then you can organize them in your single home!

We hope this extension is useful for marketers or anyone looking to learn more about FB Ads and TikTok Ads. We welcome any feedback and intend to improve the extension and Denote.
For more information, visit https://denote.net/.
